full_text: Case 1:20-cr-00330-PAE Document 743 Filed 08/10/22 Page 224 of 247 356 LBUVMAX6 Jane - direct 1 A. Because some of it has to go to counsel and litigation and filing documents and such. 2 Q. How much did you ultimately receive? 3 A. Approximately 2.9 million. 4 Q. Has that money been wired to you already? 5 A. Yes 6 Q. As part of the settlement that you received from the fund, were you required to dismiss your lawsuit against Maxwell and the Estate of Jeffrey Epstein? 7 A. Yes. 8 Q. And did you dismiss the lawsuit against Maxwell after you received an award from the fund? 9 A. Yes. 10 Q. Based on your understanding, will the jury's verdict in this case affect the award that you received from the victim compensation fund? 11 MS. MENNINGER: Objection, your Honor. 12 THE COURT: Just a moment. 13 I have to hear you. 14 (Continued on next page) 15 SOUTHERN DISTRICT REPORTERS, P.C. (212) 805-0300 DOJ-OGR-00017586
